WITH SD_INF AS ( SELECT DISTINCT SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_PKG_ITM_IZ /* 모종패키지품목내역 FA109 */ ) SELECT SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , VST_DT , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS INSTALL_UPLOAD , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS AS_UPLOAD , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '3' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS BS_UPLOAD , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '0' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS TOTAL_UPLOAD /* 총 업로드수량 */ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '1' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS EXP_INSTALL /* 설치 사용예정 */ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '2' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS EXP_AS /* AS 사용예정 */ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '3' THEN LIM_QTY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS EXP_BS /* BS 사용예정 */ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '1' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS INSTALL_CNT /* 설치 건수 */ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '2' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS AS_CNT /* AS 건수 */ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN QTY_CD = '3' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS BS_CNT /* BS 건수 */ , NVL(CASE WHEN SUM(LIM_QTY) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(LIM_QTY) END, 0) AS USE_QTY /* 사용수량 */ FROM ( SELECT S1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , SD_INF.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , S1.VST_DT , S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , S1.LIM_QTY , 0 AS CNT , '0' AS QTY_CD FROM TB_SVPD_DCBY_SDING_RCP_LIM_IZ S1 /* 일별모종접수한도내역 FA105 */ INNER JOIN SD_INF ON S1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD = SD_INF.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD WHERE S1.LIM_SN = (SELECT MAX(LIM_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_DCBY_SDING_RCP_LIM_IZ TEMP WHERE S1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD = TEMP.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = TEMP.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AND S1.VST_DT = TEMP.VST_DT AND S1.LIM_SN = S1.LIM_SN) AND S1.VST_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
UNION ALL
SELECT P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , B2.VST_DUEDT AS VST_DT , SUBSTR(B1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD,1,1) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_APY_WTCF AS LIM_QTY , SUM(1) * -1 AS CNT , '2' AS QTY_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ B1 /* 고객서비스BS대상내역 AC251 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ B2 /* 고객서비스BS배정내역 AC261 */ ON B1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = B2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND B1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD = B2.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD AND B1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = B2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_PKG_ITM_IZ P1 ON B1.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.SDING_PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND B1.ASN_OJ_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND SUBSTR(B1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD,1,1) = '2' AND B2.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') AND B2.VST_DUEDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND B2.CNFM_PSIC_ASN_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , B2.VST_DUEDT , SUBSTR(B1.SV_BIZ_MCLSF_CD,1,1) , P1.SDING_PKG_APY_WTCF
UNION ALL
SELECT P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , A1.VST_CNFMDT AS VST_DT , A1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_APY_WTCF AS LIM_QTY , SUM(1) * -1 AS CNT , A1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD AS QTY_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A1 /* 고객서비스AS설치배정이력 AC221 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ A2 /* 고객서비스AS설치대상내역 AC211 */ ON A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_PKG_ITM_IZ P1 ON A2.PD_CD = P1.SDING_PD_CD WHERE A1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '0') AND A1.VST_CNFMDT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , A1.VST_CNFMDT , A1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , P1.SDING_PKG_APY_WTCF ) MAIN WHERE VST_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY SDING_PKG_GRP_CD , SDING_PKG_GRP_CD_NM , VST_DT ORDER BY VST_DT DESC, SDING_PKG_GRP_CD ASC
